title: ufont.com
content:
Hi!

I'm illustrating a children's book and i was looking for free fonts. I bumped into Sassoon Primary. I downloaded it from ufonts.com, it says it's free.

Is this website reliable? I need to know because it'll be troublesome to get into legal issues later!

Thanks! :)
author: pranita.kocharekar

comments.content: [Sassoon Primary](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153341/http:/www.identifont.com/show?3XD) was done by Rosemary Sassoon and Adrian Williams and is a commercial font. No freefont. Please purchase it via one of the vendors in the link. Your above mentioned site is in no way reliable. Better go to fontsquirrel.com for quite reliable free fonts.
Ufont.com has many commerical fonts so be very careful - better luck at Dafont.com or AbstractFonts.com.
Phew! Thank you so much! I'm in love with the font, so i'll purchase it.
